Title: Shafeekudeen and Shabana captured the love and longing in Jayadeva’s Gita Govindam
Content: Jayadeva’s 12th century epic work Gita Govindam is a timeless literary piece and a popular choreographic choice of dancers. At Natyarangam’s ‘Krishna Bharatham’ festival, BK Shafeekudeen and Shabana
Author: Jagyaseni Chatterjee
